snippet.title: BURAMATO - OFFICIAL TRAILER 2025 [4K]
snippet.description:
[DEVELOPMENT FOOTAGE, SUBJECT TO CHANGE.]

BURAMATO is a fast-paced semi open-world 3D Action-RPG set in high fantasy settings of traditional Bornean folktales.

Explore a vast fast-paced Action RPG inspired by traditional Bornean mythology. Slay monsters with stylish combos and discover the Old Lords’ cursed lands to unravel the secrets behind your lost memory.

Wishlist and Follow Buramato On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1726560/Buramato/ 

join us on Discord : https://discord.gg/3CNdrYM3zf
